sql-statement.sql: select * from sys_org_info t where 1=1 and t.domain_uuid=? and t.org_up_uuid=(select t2.UUID from sys_org_info t2 where t2.ORG_UP_UUID='#') order by t.modified_date desc

select t.* from sys_org_info t where 1=1 and t.domain_uuid=? and t.org_up_uuid=(select t2.UUID from sys_org_info t2 where t2.org_up_uuid=(select t3.uuid from sys_org_info t3 where t3.org_up_uuid='#') and t2.DOMAIN_UUID=?) order by t.modified_date desc
select t.* from sys_org_info t where 1=1 and t.domain_uuid=? and t.org_up_uuid=? order by t.modified_date desc
